thread.title: Shawn Henry
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Shawn Henry

author: Shawn Henry
title: Shawn Henry
text: This was actually a warranty replacement. I had been having trouble with the softener losing efficiency in the water treatment. It took a little of back and forth trouble shooting, but they did replace my unit. Tech support and customer service are always readily available and very responsive. Replace unit is in, and My water is fantastic. Would highly recommend.
